Package org.eclipse.mosaic.rti.api

Interface FederateExecutor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DockerFederateExecutor, ExecutableFederateExecutor, JavaFederateExecutor, NopFederateExecutor
    public interface FederateExecutor

    The FederateExecutor is used to start the federate the ambassador is associated with. The FederateExecutor should be able to start the federate and close it locally, as well as remotely.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  FederateExecutor.FederateStarterException

      Starts the federate locally in the given working dir.

      Starts the federate locally in the given working dir.
      void stopLocalFederate()
      Stops the previously locally started federate.
      void stopRemoteFederate​(PrintStream sshStreamOut)
      Stops the previously remotely started federate.

    • Method Detail

      • startLocalFederate

        Process startLocalFederate​(File workingDir)
                    throws FederateExecutor.FederateStarterException
        Starts the federate locally in the given working dir.
        Parameters:
        workingDir - the working directory
        Returns:
        the local process of the federate
        Throws:
        FederateExecutor.FederateStarterException - if something went wrong during starting the federate

      • stopLocalFederate

        void stopLocalFederate()
                throws FederateExecutor.FederateStarterException
        Stops the previously locally started federate.
        Throws:
        FederateExecutor.FederateStarterException - if the start of the federate failed

      • startRemoteFederate

        int startRemoteFederate​(CLocalHost host,
                        PrintStream sshStreamOut,
                        InputStream sshStreamIn)
                 throws FederateExecutor.FederateStarterException
        Starts the federate locally in the given working dir.
        Parameters:
        host - information about the remote host the federate is started on
        sshStreamOut - the ssh output stream to send commands to the host
        sshStreamIn - the ssh input stream to read the console output of the remote host shell
        Returns:
        the local process of the federate
        Throws:
        FederateExecutor.FederateStarterException - if something went wrong during starting the federate

      • stopRemoteFederate

        void stopRemoteFederate​(PrintStream sshStreamOut)
                 throws FederateExecutor.FederateStarterException
        Stops the previously remotely started federate.
        Parameters:
        sshStreamOut - the ssh output stream to send commands to the host
        Throws:
        FederateExecutor.FederateStarterException - if something went wrong during starting the federate
